data.title: Citywide Promotional, Novelty, & Apparel Items - RFP (184892)
data.meta_description: Citywide Promotional, Novelty, & Apparel Items - RFP (184892) The City of Detroit Office of Contracting and Procurement (OCP) requests quotes from qualified suppliers to provide citywide promotional, novelty, and apparel items as needed for various departments’ programs and activities being provided throughout the City of Detroit.   Citywide Promotional, Novelty, & Apparel Items DOC
